title: Headline sans close to Deja Rip
content:
Hi

I'd like to know what sans they use in this publication? Closest I can get is Deja Rip.  
Any ID's greatly appreciated.

[http://www.optometry.co.uk/magazine/issue/141030132151-4cf8a9e96c9544638...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416040054/http:/www.optometry.co.uk/magazine/issue/141030132151-4cf8a9e96c95446383bf544b7c102e6c "http://www.optometry.co.uk/magazine/issue/141030132151-4cf8a9e96c95446383bf544b7c102e6c")

Thanks
author: dendicott
